scripts.seed:all: npm run -s seed && npm run -s seed:related && node scripts/runRankingBatch.cjs && node scripts/updateUserRanks.cjs
scripts.seed:docker: docker compose run --rm --no-deps -e GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-project -e FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=firebase-emulators:8080 batch-scheduler node scripts/seedDummyData.cjs
scripts.seed:related:docker: docker compose run --rm --no-deps -e GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-project -e FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=firebase-emulators:8080 batch-scheduler node scripts/seedRelated.cjs
scripts.batch:rankings:docker: docker compose run --rm --no-deps -e FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=firebase-emulators:8080 batch-scheduler node scripts/runRankingBatch.cjs
scripts.batch:user-ranks:docker: docker compose run --rm --no-deps -e FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=firebase-emulators:8080 batch-scheduler node scripts/updateUserRanks.cjs
scripts.seed:all:docker: npm run -s seed:docker && npm run -s seed:related:docker && npm run -s batch:rankings:docker && npm run -s batch:user-ranks:docker
